tests.name: Quiz - QUESTIONS.txt
tests.description: Check if the answers in QUESTIONS.txt are correct. This file must be edited so that the correct ( ) choices are replaced with (X) and no other changes are made to the file.

tests.name: redirect_child
tests.description: Runs the program 'redirect_child' twice, each time providing a different file name as a command-line argument. Checks that a child process is created and has its output redirected to the proper file.
